lokaye boho ratawal mema aarthika parihaniyata muhuna dun namuth hitlarge anugamikayo prajathanthrawadi waimar rajayata prashna wisandiya no haki bawa huwa dakwuha. 1934 warshaye di jathinge sangamayen iwath wu hitlar jarmaniya nawatha yuddhayak kara meheyawiya. 1938 di asalwasi oostriyawa aakramanaya kala hitlar eya jarmaniyata aanda gena ehi natsiwadi palanayak aarambha kale ya.

mulika pasal adhyapanaya dikwalla moggalipuththa thissa widyalayeni (warthamana kumarathungu munidas maha widuhala)dahathun wani wiyedi 1927 agosthu 12 wani dina mathara weraduwa weluwanaramayedi ewakata wiharadhipathiwa wada wisu pathegama shri්ra aaryawansha maha na himipanange aacharyathwayen dikwalle dhammaloka himi namin pawidi bimata athulath wuha.thama guruhimipanan wahanse wethin bana daham heranawath piliweth ragath athara 1928 pebarawari 10 dina mathara walpola siri mangala piriwenata athulathwa igenum katayuthu aarambha kalaha.
